name: Transat A.T. Inc

goal: Transat A.T. Inc. is an integrated tour operator that specializes in holiday travel and offers more than 60 destination countries. Transat, which was created in Canada and has offices in many other countries, is an international company that owns an air carrier, provides destination services, is active in the accommodation industry and operates an extensive distribution network.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, External Relations, Transport
